name: Lid of the Neptune Vase
description: Lid of the Neptune Vase; Factory of Geminiano Cozzi (Italian (Venetian), active 1764 - 1812); Venice, Veneto, Italy; 1800 - 1988; Hybrid soft-paste porcelain; 12.5 cm (4 15/16 in.); 88.DE.9.1.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
